TopicTitle: How to add Mechjeb to the Probe Parts?

Articles.Content: I was wondering how to add Mechjeb 2 to the stock Probe Parts. I know that this has already been asked probably, but I did a quick search and found nothing. Any help would be much appreciated!

I think the lines

MODULE

{

name = MechJebCore

}

Are the ones the will call up Mechjeb, they're in the part.cfg of the AR202 case that came with MJ2
